titleStmt.title: Cotta contra Antonium: or An Ant-Antony: or An Ant-apology manifesting Doctor Antony his apologie for aurum potabile, in true and equall ballance of right reason, to be false and counterfait. By Iohn Cotta Doctor in Physicke.
titleStmt.author: Cotta, John, 1575?-1650?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield & Iames Short for Henry Cripps,

notesStmt.note: Answers: Anthony, Francis. The apologie, or defence of a verity heretofore published concerning a medicine called aurum potabile.
Leaf **2r indicates publication was originally planned in 1616--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
